00026 void BaseObject::yaw(Radian radians)
00027 {
00028     Quaternion q(Radian(radians), Vector3::UNIT_Y);
00029     orientation(m_orientation * q);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void BaseObject::roll(Radian radians)
00033 {
00034     Quaternion q(Radian(radians), Vector3::UNIT_Z);
00035     orientation(m_orientation * q);
00036 }

00049 Vector3 BaseObject::displacement(const BaseObject& other) {
00050     return other.position() - position();

00059 {
00060     return m_orientation * Vector3(0, 0, -1);

00064 {

00074     m_orientation = orientation;
00075     m_orientation.normalise();

00140 void PhysicsObject::applyForce(Vector3 force) 
00141 {
00142     m_force = m_force + force;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void PhysicsObject::applyTempForce(Vector3 force) 
00146 {
00147     m_tempForce = m_tempForce + force;
00148 }
00149 
00150 void PhysicsObject::clearForces() 
00151 {
00152     m_force = Vector3(0, 0, 0);
00153     m_tempForce = Vector3(0, 0, 0);
00154 }
00155 
00156 void PhysicsObject::updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed) 
00157 {
00158     // if(m_mass == 0) {
00159     // TODO: Throw exception
00160     // }
00161     
00162     m_acceleration = (m_force + m_tempForce) / m_mass;
00163     m_velocity = m_velocity + (m_acceleration * timeElapsed);
00164     position(position() + (m_velocity * timeElapsed));
00165     m_tempForce = Vector3(0, 0, 0);
00166 }

00172 Constraint::Constraint(PhysicsObject * origin, PhysicsObject * target) :
00173     m_origin(origin), m_target(target), 
00174     m_distance(origin->displacement(*((BaseObject *)target)).length())
00175 {
00176 }

00189 {

00192 
00193 void Constraint::applyForces(Real timeElapsed)
00194 {
00195     // Spring based constraint
00196     /*
00197     Real distance = m_origin->displacement(*m_target).length();
00198     Real appliedForce = Math::Pow((distance - m_distance), 2) * 1 + Math::Abs(distance - m_distance) * 3;
00199     if(distance < m_distance) {
00200         appliedForce = -appliedForce;
00201     }
00202 
00203     m_origin->applyTempForce((m_origin->displacement(*m_target)).normalisedCopy()
00204         * appliedForce);
00205 
00206     m_target->applyTempForce((m_target->displacement(*m_origin)).normalisedCopy()
00207         * appliedForce);
00208     */
00209 
00210     // Orbit constraint
00211     Vector3 normalVector = m_target->displacement(*m_origin);
00212     if(normalVector.length() > m_distance) {
00213         Plane normalPlane = Plane(normalVector, 0);
00214         normalPlane.normalise();
00215         Vector3 curVelocity = m_origin->getVelocity() - m_target->getVelocity();
00216         Vector3 desiredVelocity = normalPlane.projectVector(curVelocity) + m_target->getVelocity();
00217         Vector3 velocityOffset = desiredVelocity - m_origin->getVelocity();
00218     
00219         m_origin->applyTempForce(((velocityOffset * m_origin->mass()) / timeElapsed));
00220     }
00221 }

00243 Real SphereCollisionObject::radius() const

00247 
00248 bool SphereCollisionObject::checkCollision(const SphereCollisionObject& object) const
00249 { 
00250     return position().squaredDistance(object.position()) <= Math::Pow(radius() + object.radius(), 2);
00251 }
